Translate.NoReminders: This app allowing you to bulk delete Reminders. To use it, navigate to Resources > Cataloging > Reminders.
Translate.NumReminders: A total of {{ num }} items have been selected.
Translate.Select: The list below shows all the reminders listed on the Reminder Management page. These can be filtered by creation date, reminder type or reminder status.
Translate.ConfirmDelCount: Are you sure you want to delete {{ delNum }} reminder(s)?
